pages.text: $(bgreen)Repeater$() is fierce and doesn't take attitude from anybody. it shoots peas to keep people at a distance. Secretly, though, it yearns for love.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)200$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)two peas$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several peas each tick$() which last 6 seconds, and will shoot several $(l)big peas$() after super mode.
